content: **na than** na-thən noun usu as object dropped his favorite vest into the wash by accident and when all was said and done it came out shriveled like a prune and child sized we decided to knit nathan a replacement using our luxurious cashmere he wanted it to be as understated as possible but we couldn t resist adding some ribbing detail on the sides which incidentally acts as an automatic size adjuster for those days when nathan decides to skip the gym origin new york city pattern written by the *jones & vandermeer* design team
